name: Project Chimera (itch)
description:
A Sci-Fi Horror Game with procedurally generated maps inspired from various SCP games and based on the latest unreal engine 5 for astonishing graphic, every run will be different.

Hi My name is Manuel Bindi or Lykan Iluvatar if you know me from Itch.io.I am a game developer and i bring to you this hellish game, is in a pre-alpha stage now and i need you for Suggestions, bug signalations and much more.

You Are Kahl and we are in the future ( 2121 A.C.) and you find yourself in a sort of strange malfunctioning lab, but you are not alone, an escaped experiment will hunt you down.

For now there is only one monster type and you can only randomly find a tracker ( that signal you the distance from the monster ) and a flashlight ( trust me, you'll need it. )

If you like it consider to make a donation on this, please do it you will help me greatly =)

All the donations will be used for improve the game and will provide better assets, or will cover the steam taxes.
